name: Sustainable Asset Management Solutions Pte Ltd
description: Sustainable Asset Management Solutions Pte Ltd (SAMS) is a privately-owned electronics waste management company. SAMS provides Electronic Waste Recycling and IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) solutions. Sustainable Asset Management Solutions Pte Ltd (SAMS) is a privately-owned electronics waste management company.
